Export.zv: IRIS for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 for x86-64) 2023.1.3 (Build 517U)
Export.Routine:
;;;;; CAV ;;;;; ;;;;; 04.06.25 jk; export autoru a projektu do CSV pro Fair Wizard ;;;;; 13.03.25 jk; pridano genDoiDataCite ;;;;; 10.03.25 dk; e-mail 'kopcanska@cosmotron.cz' přidán do DFLTMAILCC ;;;;; 28.02.25 jk; zruseno CreateHandleNet, pouziva se DUI ;;;;; 08.01.25 mk; planovana uloha uvolnenie embarga C52b na A ;;;;; 19.09.24 jk; import projektu z Vavai CEP do autorit ;;;;; 20.03.24 tt; pridana vynucena reindexace solr pro databaze ;;;;; 15.01.24 tt; pridan email asep_repozitar@lib.cas.cz do vystupu V7 ;;;;; 17.10.23 ln; upraveny cesty zaloh pro asep-primary-node ;;;;; 15.08.23 tt; sitemap: provedena zmena popisu ;;;;; 14.01.21 tt; oddeleni specialni task pro ziskavani zaznam z WOS - dlouhotrvajici uloha ;;;;; 29.12.21 tt; pridano spousteni lanovane ulohy pro importovane zaznamy z WOS ;;;;; 10.08.20 tt; nastaveny mazani autority na ctvrtek ;;;;; 10.07.20 jk; zrusen duplicitne uvedeny email klimes ;;;;; 18.06.20 jb; změna příjemců pošty DFLTMAILCC ;;;;; 30.04.20 tt; pridan sloupec TYPSPOL do V7 ;;;;; 24.02.19 tt; upraveny roky V10 na roky 2015-2019. ;;;;; 11.02.19 tt; rozsireny export V10 podle potreb CAV ;;;;; 07.01.20 tt; pridany nove pole ;;;;; 23.04.19 tt; zalozena planovana uloha na vymaz nenavazanych autorit ;;;;; 13.02.19 tt; preusporadani ukolu v task1 - po dohode s JK ;;;;; 15.10.18 tt; pridany email backupinfo@cosmotron.cz k planovanym uloham ;;;;; 07.08.18 tt; procisteni pri zapisovani uloh ;;;;; 05.04.18 tt; pridany soupce do V7 ;;;;; 19.10.17 tt; pridana sloupce pro zobrazeni hodnoticich kriterii v vystupu V7 ;;;;; 23.06.17 tt; odstranen email rozehnal@lib.cas.cz a nahrazen arl-server@lib.cas.cz ;;;;; 12.06.17 jk; volano pres ReportCommon ;;;;; 30.11.16 tt; upraveny emailove adresy - pridani zakazniku ;;;;; 10.10.16 tt; zalozeno ;;;;; --- ;;;;; #define BACKUPDIR "/srv/lv1_asep_repository/backup" #define ROUTINEN "ZBACK" #define DFLTMAILCC "arl@lib.cas.cz,arl-server@lib.cas.cz,klimes@cosmotron.cz,kopcanska@cosmotron.cz,backupinfo@cosmotron.cz" #include Common
;------------------------------------------------------------ ; ENTRY POINTS -------------------------------------------------- ; typy zaloh na kazdy den Pondelok..Nedela
full d ##class(User.UtilBackup).backupMain("FFFFFFF",$$$BACKUPDIR,"Cav",$$$DFLTMAILCC,"/srv/lv1_asep_repository/backup/packed","asep-frontend-node") q
inc d ##class(User.UtilBackup).backupMain("IIIIIII",$$$BACKUPDIR,"Cav",$$$DFLTMAILCC,"/srv/lv1_asep_repository/backup/packed","asep-frontend-node") q
cleanup d ##class(util.cleanUp).cleanUpDir("UnTablesd*ARL_CLEANUP_DIR") q
task1
n Day s Day=##class(UtilBackup).DAYOFWK() n DayM s DayM=+$e(##class(Util).date(),7,8) n sZN s sZN=$znspace d ##class(Util).msg("task1 day="_Day_" start at "_$$$ShowDTime)
; daily - no mail w !,"old journal cleanup" zn "%SYS" d PPURGE^JRNUTIL zn sZN
; 15.01.24 tt; pridan email asep_repozitar@lib.cas.cz do vystupu V7 ; 13.02.19 tt; preusporadani ukolu v task1 - po dohode s JK ; specialni vystupy pro CAV d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("runRepV7Cav^ZBACK()","Cav - vystup V7",$$$DFLTMAILCC_",asep_repozitar@lib.cas.cz",,"Cav") d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("runRepV10Cav^ZBACK()","Cav - vystup V10",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav") d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("runRepV11Cav^ZBACK()","Cav - vystup V11",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav")
; Cav - generovani identifikatoru handle.net pres DUI frontu d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(User.CavS).GenC60Handle()","Cav - C60a vytvoreni identifikatoru handle.netu",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav")
; Cav - generovani DOI DataCite pres DUI frontu ; - volat az po uloze GenC60Handle aby byl uz v zaznamu identitikator handle.net // zatim ponechat zakomentovane //d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(User.CavS).genDoiDataCite()","Cav - generovani DOI DataCite",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav")
; mk uvolnenie embarga po vyprsani C91b v C52b z E na A d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(User.CavS).EmbargoC52b()","Cav - uvolneni embarga",$$$DFLTMAILCC_",kocian@cosmotron.cz",,"Cav")
; Cav - repozitar - kontrola vyprsenych souhlasu d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(i2.cust.cav.approvalAuthor).sendMailBatch()","Cav - repozitar - kontrola vyprsenych souhlasu",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav")
; 28.02.25 jk; zruseno CreateHandleNet, pouziva se DUI ; Cav - doplneni handle linku na server ; d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(User.CavS).CreateHandleNet()","Cav - doplneni handle linku na server",$$$DFLTMAILCC_",tichy@lib.cas.cz",,"Cav")
; denni export CavUnTablesd d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(UtilBackup).batchExportX(""CavUnTablesd"",""ui-1 sort-1 compress-7za+a#7z"")","denni export nastaveni CavUnTablesd",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav")
; cisteni autorit kazdy den d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(SPCommon).runAuthCleanUp(""Cav"")","cisteni autorit",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav")
; 10.08.20 tt; nastaveny mazani autority na ctvrtek ; 23.04.19 tt; zalozena planovana uloha na vymaz nenavazanych autorit d:(Day=4) ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(User.CavS).VymazNenavAutorit("""")","Vymaz nenavazanych autorit",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav")
; 29.12.21 tt; pridano spousteni lanovane ulohy pro importovane zaznamy z WOS ;d:(Day=4) ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(i2.xmlgw).GetRecordsWos(""Cav"")","Impor zaznamu z WOS",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav")
; ??????????? if (Day=3) || (Day=7) { d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(Util).Xintegrit()","kontrola integrity databazy",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav") }
d ##class(Util).msg("task1 day="_Day_" finish at "_$$$ShowDTime) q
task2 n Day s Day=##class(UtilBackup).DAYOFWK() n DayM s DayM=+$e(##class(Util).date(),7,8) n sZN s sZN=$znspace
d ##class(Util).msg("task2 day="_Day_" start at "_$$$ShowDTime)
; exporty vsech databaz if ((Day = 3) || (Day = 7)) { d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(UtilBackup).batchExportX(""*"",""sort-0 ui-0 allowSaveCheck-0 compress-7za+a#7z"")","uplny export vsech databaz",$$$DFLTMAILCC_",dolezelova@knav.cz" ,,"Cav") } else { d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(UtilBackup).batchExportX(""*"",""sort-0 ui-0 allowSaveCheck-0 incr-10 compress-7za+a#7z"")","inkrementalni export vsech databaz",$$$DFLTMAILCC_",dolezelova@knav.cz" ,,"Cav") }
d ##class(Util).msg("task2 day="_Day_" finish at "_$$$ShowDTime)
q
task3
n Day s Day=##class(UtilBackup).DAYOFWK() n DayM s DayM=+$e(##class(Util).date(),7,8) n sZN s sZN=$znspace d ##class(Util).msg("task3 day="_Day_" start at "_$$$ShowDTime)
; 14.01.21 tt; oddeleni specialni task pro ziskavani zaznam z WOS - dlouhotrvajici uloha ; 29.12.21 tt; pridano spousteni lanovane ulohy pro importovane zaznamy z WOS d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(i2.xmlgw).GetRecordsWos(""Cav"")","Impor zaznamu z WOS",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav")
d ##class(Util).msg("task3 day="_Day_" finish at "_$$$ShowDTime) q
idx1 n Day s Day=##class(UtilBackup).DAYOFWK() n DayM s DayM=+$e(##class(Util).date(),7,8) n sZN s sZN=$znspace d ##class(Util).msg("idx1 day="_Day_" start at "_$$$ShowDTime)
n s //s s="##class(Util).X(""uiseq CavUnEpca,CavUnOhlCat,CavUnAuth"")" // 20.03.24 tt; pridana vynucena reindexace solr pro databaze s s="##class(Util).X(""s CavUnEpca""),##class(Util).X(""ui solr""),##class(Util).X(""s CavUnOhlCat""),##class(Util).X(""ui solr""),##class(Util).X(""s CavUnAuth""),##class(Util).X(""ui solr"")"
try { d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain(s,"aktualizace aRL indexu vsech databaz",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav") } catch exceptionvar { d ##class(User.Util).msg("ERROR exception:"_exceptionvar.Name_exceptionvar.Location) }
d ##class(User.Util).msg("idx1 day="_Day_" finish at "_$$$ShowDTime) q
ct() public { d ##class(User.Util).msg("running ct^ZBACK at "_$$$ShowDTime) s io=$io,bOpen=0 ; 08.06.10 jk; volani getLogDir prepsano na getArlDir s fn="ct.log",logdir=##class(util.common).getArlDir("LOG") if logdir="" w !,"ERROR determining log-directory check UnTablesd ARLDIR, 200$$aLOG" $$$ZTX1("XL1") s fn=logdir_$$$PathSepp_##class(Util).logFileAddWeekNo(fn) open fn:("WS":/APPEND):0 if '$t { u io } else { u fn s bOpen=1 }
d ##class(Util).X("ct") d ##class(Util).X("i2e start 5")
w !,!,!,"DONE "_$$$ShowDTime
if bOpen close fn u io d ##class(User.Util).msg("done ct^ZBACK at "_$$$ShowDTime) q }
pstat n Day s Day=##class(UtilBackup).DAYOFWK() n DayM s DayM=+$e(##class(Util).date(),7,8) d ##class(User.Util).msg("serverPerformance day="_Day_" start at "_$$$ShowDTime) d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(Util).X(""pstat %c o 200 'default,client* 4,5"")"," server performance statistics",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav") d ##class(User.Util).msg("serverPerformance day="_Day_" finish at "_$$$ShowDTime) q
; zapojena kontrola shadowingu taskshdw n Day s Day=##class(UtilBackup).DAYOFWK() n DayM s DayM=+$e(##class(Util).date(),7,8) d ##class(Util).msg("taskShadowCnt day="_Day_" start at "_$$$ShowDTime) d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("runShadowCnt^ZBACK()","kontrola stinovani",$$$DFLTMAILCC,,"Cav") d ##class(Util).msg("taskShadowCnt day="_Day_" finish at "_$$$ShowDTime) q
; tt; specialni vystup spousteny pro cav runRepV7Cav() public { ; 30.04.20 tt; pridan sloupec TYPSPOL do V7 ; 12.06.17 jk; volano pres ReportCommon ; 02.07.14 tt; pridano ISSN a NazevSZP do V7 ; 30.05.14 tt; rutina si musi nechat, protoze se spousti z RUN_TASK ; 14.05.14 tt; pridane do V2 a V7 RVO ; 22.04.14 tt; zalozeno spousteni V7 - nahradi V2 s par="report ReportCommon exporta cav_un_epca CavUnEpca,1 «¤»!ye¤bt¤1993»2055«!exp¤=¤a«'!dk¤=¤W @PRAC,T16r . 0 . ##class(util.ie.csv).report(.pEnvironment,""970b-DruhDokInterni,@DKREP1-DruhDokUprav,T16r-RokUplatnVysl,T16c-ImpaktFakt,T16f-5LetyImpaktFakt,C26b-ExportDoRIV,101a-JazykDok,@PRAC-Ustav,001-SysNo,%rep-CisloVyskytuPracVZazn,@ODDELV-Odd_do_2009,@ODDELV_STI-Odd_cze,@ODDELV_STJ-Odd_eng,@ODDELV_STK-Odd_zkr_cze,@ODDELV_STL-Odd_zkr_eng,@ODDELPOC-PocOdd_do_2009,@AUTPOC-PocAut,@AUTDOMPOC-PocDomAut,@AUTDOMVYPODD-VypDomAut,@VYZZAM-VyzkumnyZamer,@RVO-RVO,463/011a-ISSN,463/011e-EISSN,@NAZEVSZP-NazevSZP,@HODKRIT_D-Qais,@HODKRIT_E-Qsjr,@HODKRIT_F-Qtc,@HODKRIT_C-IF_PCT,@HODKRIT_B-AIS_AL_PC,@HODKRIT_A-AIS_PCT,@HODKRIT_j-AIS,@HODKRIT_s-SJR,C86a-Qtc_zavorky,C86b-Qtc_N.A.,C86c-Qtc_DT,C86d-Qtc_Obor,@TYPSPOL-TypSpoluprace¤h"") 0 1 . . . ."_$c(10)_"sys-task"_$c(10)_"server"_$c(10)_"CMD_CAV_UN_EPCA" s io=$io,ret=##class(Util).DBCommand(par) if $e(ret,1,8)'="ok: rep_" w !,"Error: "_ret q u io w !,"Report ok: "_##class(util.common).getArlDir("URL_LOG")_"reports/"_$p(ret," ",2) }
; tt; specialni vystup spousteny pro cav runRepV7CavOLD() public { ; 12.06.17 jk; volano pres ReportCommon ; 02.07.14 tt; pridano ISSN a NazevSZP do V7 ; 30.05.14 tt; rutina si musi nechat, protoze se spousti z RUN_TASK ; 14.05.14 tt; pridane do V2 a V7 RVO ; 22.04.14 tt; zalozeno spousteni V7 - nahradi V2 s par="report ReportCommon exporta cav_un_epca CavUnEpca,1 «¤»!ye¤bt¤1993»2055«!exp¤=¤a«'!dk¤=¤W @PRAC,T16r . 0 . ##class(util.ie.csv).report(.pEnvironment,""970b-DruhDokInterni,@DKREP1-DruhDokUprav,T16r-RokUplatnVysl,T16c-ImpaktFakt,T16f-5LetyImpaktFakt,C26b-ExportDoRIV,101a-JazykDok,@PRAC-Ustav,001-SysNo,%rep-CisloVyskytuPracVZazn,@ODDELV-Odd,@ODDELPOC-PocOdd,@AUTPOC-PocAut,@AUTDOMPOC-PocDomAut,@AUTDOMVYPODD-VypDomAut,@VYZZAM-VyzkumnyZamer,@RVO-RVO,463/011a-ISSN,463/011e-EISSN,@NAZEVSZP-NazevSZP,@HODKRIT_D-Qais,@HODKRIT_E-Qsjr,@HODKRIT_F-Qtc,@HODKRIT_C-IF_PCT,@HODKRIT_B-AIS_AL_PC,@HODKRIT_A-AIS_PCT,@HODKRIT_j-AIS,@HODKRIT_s-SJR,C86a-Qtc_zavorky,C86b-Qtc_N.A.,C86c-Qtc_DT,C86d-Qtc_Obor¤h"") 0 1 . . . ."_$c(10)_"sys-task"_$c(10)_"server"_$c(10)_"CMD_CAV_UN_EPCA" s io=$io,ret=##class(Util).DBCommand(par) if $e(ret,1,8)'="ok: rep_" w !,"Error: "_ret q u io w !,"Report ok: "_##class(util.common).getArlDir("URL_LOG")_"reports/"_$p(ret," ",2) }
; tt; specialni vystup spousteny pro cav runRepV10Cav() public { ; 24.02.19 tt; upraveny roky V10 na roky 2015-2019. ; 11.02.19 tt; rozsireny export V10 podle potreb CAV ; 07.01.20 tt; pridany nove pole ; 12.06.17 jk; volano pres ReportCommon ; 01.11.14 tt; upraveny sloupce ve vystupu V10 ; 28.10.14 tt; zalozeno V10 na zaklade V7 s par="report ReportCommon exporta cav_un_epca CavUnEpca,1 «¤»!ye¤bt¤2015»2019«!exp¤=¤a«'!dk¤=¤W @PRAC,T16r . 0 . ##class(util.ie.csv).report(.pEnvironment,""970b-DruhDokInterni,@DKREP1-DruhDokUprav,T16r-RokUplatnVysl,T16c-ImpaktFakt,T16f-5LetyImpaktFakt,C26b-ExportDoRIV,101a-JazykDok,@PRAC-Ustav,001-SysNo,%rep-CisloVyskytuPracVZazn,@AUTPOC-PocAut,@AUTDOMPOC-PocDomAut,@AUTDOMVYPODD-VypDomAut,@VYZZAM-VyzkumnyZamer,@RVO-RVO,463/011a-ISSN,463/011e-EISSN,463/200a-NazevSZP,@HODOBOR-Obor,@HODPODOBOR-Podobor,@TYMV-Tym,@AUTDOMTYM-AutorTym,@NAZEVSZP-NazevSZP,@HODKRIT_D-Qais,@HODKRIT_E-Qsjr,@HODKRIT_F-Qtc,@HODKRIT_C-IF_PCT,@HODKRIT_B-AIS_AL_PC,@HODKRIT_A-AIS_PCT,@HODKRIT_j-AIS,@HODKRIT_s-SJR,C86a-Qtc_zavorky,C86b-Qtc_N.A.,C86c-Qtc_DT,C86d-Qtc_Obor¤h"") 0 1 . . . ."_$c(10)_"sys-task"_$c(10)_"server"_$c(10)_"CMD_CAV_UN_EPCA" s io=$io,ret=##class(Util).DBCommand(par) if $e(ret,1,8)'="ok: rep_" w !,"Error: "_ret q u io w !,"Report ok: "_##class(util.common).getArlDir("URL_LOG")_"reports/"_$p(ret," ",2) } ; tt; specialni vystup spousteny pro cav runRepV11Cav() public { ; 12.06.17 jk; volano pres ReportCommon ; 21.03.15 tt; upravena definice V11 ; 08.03.15 tt; zalozeno V11 na zaklade V10 s par="report ReportCommon exporta cav_un_epca CavUnEpca,1 «¤»!ye¤bt¤2010»2014«!exp¤=¤a«'!dk¤=¤W @TYMT,T16r . 0 . ##class(util.ie.csv).report(.pEnvironment,""970b-DruhDokInterni,@DKREP1-DruhDokUprav,T16r-RokUplatnVysl,@USTAV_T_ENG-Ustav_eng,@USTAV_T_CZ-Ustav_cze,@USTAV_T_ZK-Ustav_zkr,C26e-Ustav_Vlas_Zaz,001-SysNo,@UTWOS-UT_WOS,463/011a-ISSN,463/011e-EISSN,463/200a-NazevSZP,@TYM_T_OBOR-Obor,@TYM_T_PODOBOR-Podobor,@TYM_T_CZ-Tym_cze,@TYM_T_ENG-Tym_eng,@TYM_T_PEERREV-Tym_rev¤h"") 0 1 . . . ."_$c(10)_"sys-task"_$c(10)_"server"_$c(10)_"CMD_CAV_UN_EPCA" s io=$io,ret=##class(Util).DBCommand(par) if $e(ret,1,8)'="ok: rep_" w !,"Error: "_ret q u io w !,"Report ok: "_##class(util.common).getArlDir("URL_LOG")_"reports/"_$p(ret," ",2) }
sitemap() public { ;15.08.23 tt; provedena zmena popisu ;14.07.09 lu; pridana rutina sitemap d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(i2.sitemap2).createSitemap()","CAV - generovani sitemap",$$$DFLTMAILCC) }
impCep() public { ; 19.09.24 jk; import projektu z Vavai CEP do autorit ; zapojeno v CRONTAB ; https://cosmo2/wiki/index.php?title=CAV_API_CEP
s year=$p($zd($h),"/",3) d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(util.ie.vavai).importCavCep(""CavUnAuth"","""_year_""")","CAV - import Vavai CEP do autorit",$$$DFLTMAILCC) }
expFairWizardCSV() public { ; https://arl2.library.sk/wiki_arl/index.php/CAV/nab%C3%ADdka_2024#FAIR_Wizard_-_cs125347 ; 04.06.25 jk; export autoru a projektu do CSV pro Fair Wizard ; spousteno z CRONTAB kazdy 10ty den v mesici d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(User.CavUnAuth).expFairWizardAA()","CAV - CSV export autorit pro Fair Wizard",$$$DFLTMAILCC) d ##class(UtilBackup).taskMain("##class(User.CavUnAuth).expFairWizardAP()","CAV - CSV export projektů pro Fair Wizard",$$$DFLTMAILCC) }
